notes:
This monster can be seen during a quara raid in [[Liberty Bay]]. An easier version of [[Quara Mantassin]]s.
{{JSpoiler|You may hunt 400 [[Quara Constrictor Scout]]s, [[Quara Hydromancer Scout]]s, Quara Mantassin Scouts, [[Quara Pincher Scout]]s and [[Quara Predator Scout]]s combined as a task of the [[Killing in the Name of... Quest]].}}
name: Quara Mantassin Scout
bestiarytext: The Quara Mantassin Scout is a weaker version of [[Quara Mantassin]]s.
location: [[Malada]], [[Tiquanda/Water Elemental Cave|Water Elemental Cave]] near [[Port Hope]], [[Hrodmir Quara Scout Caves]], [[Quara Grotto]], [[Oramond]].
strategy:
'''[[Paladin]]s''': Just kill them, or you can use them so they block other quaras way so they can't reach you and you can kill the stronger quaras first.
'''[[Mage]]s''': Use [[energy strike]] and always try to keep a distance and don't run into other quaras.
'''[[Knight]]''': They are very easy to kill, they deal low damage and their defense is low.
